name: MemeStash
signal_source: Content management studies show 'content scattered across departments, platforms and authoring tools makes ongoing management difficult'
description: Personal meme and reaction image organizer with smart tagging and quick search for social sharing
target_user: Heavy social media users who collect memes and reaction images but struggle to find and organize them effectively
pain_point_evidence: Users face 'content scattered across multiple platforms' with 'unnecessary duplication and difficult review and collaboration'
differentiation: Personal curation vs. public sharing, smart organization vs. chronological storage
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited storage, advanced tagging, and cross-device sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic storage, premium for unlimited and sync features
